title: Very good
comment: Have useful settings including "Auto" mode. I think it's the best from it category. It don't reduce minimum hardware brightness instead use a filter so don't expect a longer battery life. For reduce the minimum hardware brightness try to use GravityBox (only for rooted devices). Personally (on rooted device) I use both : Xposed + GravityBox to reduce minimum hardware brightness (improve battery life) and Dimmer to reduce even more the brightness because the minimum hardware brightness is to high.

title: Doesn't quite do what it says
comment: This app simply places filters over the screen. It doesn't drop the backlight, as my phone was using more power with the app running. Notice how non-rooted apps can't mess with the softkeys? That's why no matter how low the brightness drops with this app, they always stay the same brightness. It's good for the times you need low brightness for night reading, but for God's sake people, just change the brightness in the notifications panel and skip the extra power draw this app causes...

title: Simple and works
comment: simple ui,the only screen dimmer I tried that dims the onscreen buttons.a question regarding permissions.If you don't mind me asking is modify settings and retrieve running apps necessary for your app?other dimmer apps don't have them. They were more basic so maybe that's why.feature request, a color tone for the filter, apparently red filter is best for the eyes in the dark.. Update filter added very quickly.

Modify settings is to change system brightness. Retrieve running apps is to exclude specify app from auto launch (only works in auto mode). Color filter is developing. Any change of brightness by system setting or 3rd app would have highest priority in control brightness, so Dimmer quit to response user's latest control in brightness.

comment: Amazing. Love it.

comment: soo simple yet elegant...

comment: Very perfect than the other apps that i had been download.. It has an adjuster how dimmer you want..

title: Full control of backlight
comment: Perfect little app, can set backlight to my choosing

title: Better than "Screen Dimmer"
comment: Just installed, but I love it so far. Allows you to adjust dimmer, pause it, or turn it off from the notification.

title: Works great
comment: Worth the download, does everything it says it does. Easy to use, nice clean look

title: Perfect app.
comment: To the developer: any plans of releasing this as open source?
It is already open source. All source code are on github. Welcom to contribute. https://github.com/giraffine

title: Use nothing else
comment: This dims the whole screen unlike others which don't dim where the touch buttons are (home, back etc) highly recommended

title: perfect
comment: great app, requires no special permissions. oops app just requested for new permission without explaining why it requires so :( would have given 5

Use auto mode and set more than one exclude app, the only one case dimmer will access currently running app. For example, I don't want dimmer activate when using camera to take pictures. In other cases dimmer never access running app.

title: Simple
comment: Simple and easy to use

title: V good
comment: 5 stars to the developer. Very good app 👍

title: Great app
comment: I can't find the developer page on g+, but I'm happy to help to make a Hungarian translation.
Very appreciate your help. Please contact me by giraffine@gmail.com I will send you the string table.

title: gr8
comment: i love this app!!  the best dimmer on playstore
Sorry for inconvenience. Version 2.7.2 should fix the bug.

title: New update
comment: Maybe I spoke too soon about not having crazy unnecessary permissions.  New update now needs to retrieve information on currently running apps. Why? All this is is a dimmer, you don't need private info or any other info other than what was needed before the update.

Use auto mode and set more than one exclude app, the only one case dimmer will access currently running app. For example, I don't want dimmer activate when using camera to take pictures. In other cases dimmer never access running app.

title: Great
comment: Best dimmer out their. Good job guys.

title: Really really good
comment: UPDATED - the devs have listened and put in a timer and auto mode. Excellent, 5 stars. Now can we get it to make a cup of tea in the morning?!   The only thing missing is a timer which turn the brightness up, for example its too dark to see how to log on in the morning!! Very good though. Thanks
Latest version has time mode or auto mode to config.

title: best I've used
comment: allows for quick adjustment of screen darkness, I'll never use another app for this purpose

title: Excellent application
comment: I would like to thank the developer of the app for making it my phone have very bright light which can b reduced only till a limit after that u cannot dim the lights i searched on app store and saw this app i dwnloaded it and wow its awsome app easy to use user friendly phone friendly bcoz of the size in all way a best app keep it up make some other fab app... Thank you

title: Works great!
comment: Easy to use, fully adjustable, with options to let it set itself according to the ambient light or automatically dim at a specific time and undim at another time. I have mine set up on a schedule and it's never too bright in the middle of the night. I can't think of anything I'd change on this app.

title: Hey BUG found!!
comment: Hm, this app is really better than the other apps of its kind, but it has a bug. I dont know why, but the INSTALL button doesnt work while trying to install an apk if I use Dimmer.
Android disable the installation whenever any app with permission SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW is active. I will keep monitor this issue.

title: Works exactly as the description.
comment: This is one of the most important apps on my phone. Screen brightness is probably the largest battery hog on any smart phone. This app allows me to dim the screen to the extent that it is not visible at all. This is a fantastic option, and makes reading at night much more pleasant. I tried a few other apps before this one, but I found this one to be the easiest to use.

title: Hogs mem
comment: 22+ mb just for screen dimming?
Dimming screen need create a window mask in screen resolution size. If screen resolution is 1080x1920, the window mask uses 1080x1920 ARGB pixels. Dimmer had tried best to reduce the memory usage.

title: Very helpful!
comment: A very helpful app for those who use mobile at night / dark environments..  Dims screen very effectively so that your eyes won't hurt!

title: DANGEROUS! No default setting. I was locked out of my phone for a week because I couldn't see the screen Otherwise, best dimmer. Hands down. BUT...
Perfect
comment: Works perfect. Very user friendly. Like the way it dims. Easy to change brightness from the notifications bar and easy to close out of.

title: The Best..
comment: This is the best app out there..I tried lots of apps in its class and finally found it best..   But icon and design of app is outdated and should be outstanding and up to date. Decrease the app size also if possible

title: Great app but...
comment: I have to exit it when Im trying to safe my battery life by having less apps open.
Dimmer design is system brightness is the highest priority. Therefore, any adjustment by system brightness will stop dimmer.

title: For Andi Flagg
comment: Under Dimmer settings you can increase the range of brightness allowed. Therefore,  exiting the app won't be necessary.

title: Excellent dimmer app
comment: Very useful with sensor, timer anx widget feature
THE VERY BEST❗💡

title: Thank you for this great app
comment: Sample,useful and free

title: A bug report.
comment: When returning to bright mode, system auto brightness setting doesn't always get restored. Most of the time it just shifts to lowest system brightness point which is still quite dim under direct sunlight. Big inconvenience. I'm still rating it 5* hope this will be fixed soon. Reply: Thanks for the response. Yes, widget mode was OFF. I can further confirm you that this bug isn't present in 'Time mode' either. It happens with 'Auto mode' only.
Version 2.6.1 should fix the problem.

title: 50% as useful as before.
comment: With full screen swipe control, you used to be able to control brightness up to 100%. Now you can only do so up to 50%. Therefore this is now half as useful as it used to be.  EDIT: OK, I've just seen you can maximise the range in settings  However, this was still at its best 2 releases ago, because sat in the notification area makes it out of easy thumb reach. Plus I keep seeing brightness changes happening while its running.

WidgetMode ON: Click icon to switch dim and bright directly.
WidgetMode OFF: Click icon to launch full screen swipe control.
Clicking notification now always goes to setting rather than launch full screen control.
Do you want clicking notification goes to launch full screen control?

title: Just right.
comment: Clean, Simple, Useful.  No draconian privileges are required.

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what i was looking for...something that gives me much more control on brightness..although technically this app is not reducing brightness but putting a layer on top of the screen and adjusting its opacity..

Best app to lower the brightness of my S4! Just like how I do it on my iPhone.	Other apps claim to lower the screen backlight but doesn't really go lower than the brightness setting from the notification menu. This actually goes lower than that!

title: Excellent
comment: Very simple and light, and just looks good. To the developer: make the background black and the text white, the last thing someone wants to look at when the display is too bright is a full page white app. Also, it doesn't automatically re-enable autobrightness upon stopping the app. A couple minor tweaks and its a solid app.
